drcl.inet.mac
Class SwitchedBeamAntenna

java.lang.Object
  drcl.DrclObj
      drcl.comp.Component
          drcl.inet.mac.Antenna
              drcl.inet.mac.SwitchedBeamAntenna
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, ObjectCloneable, ObjectDuplicable, java.io.Serializable
public class SwitchedBeamAntenna
extends Antenna

This class is derived from class Antenna.java Before using, it has to be initialized with pattern files. A simple example: "mkdir drcl.inet.mac.WirelessPhy phy inject "create SwitchedBeam Antenna" phy/.antenna@ inject "azimuthpatterns = azimuth_file" phy/.antenna@ (required) inject "elevationpatterns = elevation_file" phy/.antenna@ (optional, if occur, has to be after the above line)"

Author:
Chunyu Hu
See Also:
Serialized Form
